channel.title: Have you used the Original Auxy Music Creation app?
channel.description:
<h3> Have you used the Original Auxy Music Creation app?
[poll type=regular public=true] * Yes * No [/poll] How many years have you been Involved in making music? [poll name=poll2 type=number min=1 max=20 step=1 public=true] [/poll] How many songs have you made with Auxy (And posted on Soundcloud and/or other music platform?) [poll name=poll3 type=multiple min=1 max=5] * +1 * +5 * +10 * +20 * Other [/poll]
Do you aboslutley positivley Love auxy? [poll name=poll4 type=regular] * Yes * No (Do not answer this) [/poll]

item.title: Have you used the Original Auxy Music Creation app?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:

item.title: Have you used the Original Auxy Music Creation app?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
The last one shouldn’t be a question even ;3 But I honestly wish Auxy had a bit more advanced features, like tempo changes, no limit on time signatures and overall a bit more non-electronic instruments available, or at least synthesized counterparts xD
